question: With which country the Cabinet of India apprised of MoU on Technical Cooperation in Rail Sector?
explanation: Union Cabinet has been apprised of the Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) signed with the Federal Transport Authority - Land & Maritime of the United Arab Emirates on Technical Cooperation in Rail Sector. This MoU was signed on February 10, 2018. It envisages cooperation in the areas of regulation, safety and technical investigation of accidents, station redevelopment and any other area jointly identified by the parties to the MoU. Activities undertaken under the scope of this MoU will enable Indian Railways and UAE's Federal Transport Authority to interact and share the latest developments and knowledge in the railway sector.
